title: The Chalet School Triplets
description: This story features the adventures of a set of triplets, Margot, Len and Con, at the Chalet School. Amongst other happenings they are trapped by a ferocious blizzard after a skiing excursion, Con is catapulted into a starring role, and Len is accused of shoplifting.
author: Elinor M. Brent-Dyer
